content: from the website several studies have shown that high contrast colors help to develop the very young brain and the sooner and more stimuli given the more synoptic connections are made which may produce a smarter child with that in mind here is a pattern i made for a baby afghan for my new niece emily i make no claims as to whether it will or will not make your child smarter you will need 16 oz white 8 oz each of black and red worsted weight yarn
